item.title: CVE-2022-3368|2024-09-17T04:03:45.212Z -- nortonlifelock -- %22avira%20security%22%20%E2%80%93%20for%20windows
item.description: A vulnerability within the Software Updater functionality of Avira Security for Windows allowed an attacker with write access to the filesystem, to escalate his privileges in certain scenarios. The issue was fixed with Avira Security version 1.1.72.30556.
